definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: How often do you purchase Herbal Tea Series drinks?
sentences.chinese: 你一个月会买多少次鸿福堂的凉茶系列的饮品？

sentences.english: Will you buy Hung Fook Tong's bottle herbal teas in the future?
sentences.chinese: 你以后会打算购买鸿福堂樽装凉茶吗？

sentences.english: Where would you purchase the Herbal Tea Series?
sentences.chinese: 你会在那里购买鸿福堂的凉茶系列的饮品？

sentences.english: What do you think the taste of the Herbal Tea Series?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得鸿福堂的凉茶系列的饮品的味道如何？

sentences.english: What do you think about the pricing of Herbal Tea Series?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得鸿福堂的凉茶系列的饮品价格如何？

sentences.english: Have you ever drink Hung Fook Tong's bottle herbal teas?
sentences.chinese: 你曾经饮用过鸿福堂樽装凉茶吗？

sentences.english: Do you like the out look of Hung Fook Tong's bottle herbal teas?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢鸿福堂樽装凉茶的外型设计吗？

definition: variant of 紅運|红运[hong2 yun4]
profits pouring in from all sides (idiom)/raking in money/bonanza
lucky star in the ascendant (idiom); a lucky sign
flood of good fortune fills the heavens (idiom); a lucky sign
to accept a life of ease/to enjoy a comfortable retirement
lit. (may the) five blessings descend upon this home (namely: longevity, wealth, health, virtue, and a natural death)/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
to have all one's wishes (idiom)/best wishes/all the best/may all your hopes be fulfilled
